instructions_html:
For each text fragment below, annotate each instance of the following categories:

  • EYE: eye color
  • HAIR: hair color, length, and/or style
  • PERSON: personal name or alias
  • COMPANY: company or business name
  • ETHNIC: race, ethnicity, nationality, and/or skin tone

To annotate, first highlight by clicking/dragging the word or words which best detail the instance; then specify below the category for the instance. Each group of highlighted words will use a different background color.

Examples:

Example #1 - Eye color


Given this text fragment

You would click on "blue eyes" and then select "EYE" below

Example #2 - Name and hair


Given this text fragment

You would click on "blue eyes" and then select "EYE" below

Example #3 - No annotations


Given this text fragment

You would click on "blue eyes" and then select "EYE" below

Example #4 - Ethnicity


Given this text fragment

You would click on "blue eyes" and then select "EYE" below
description: Annotate eyes, hair, names, ethnicity in free text
title: Annotate eyes, hair, names, ethnicity in free text
keywords: classification, annotation, categorization, markup, natural language, identification
